title: Get the dynamic quota on Smart+ Campaigns

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: total_quota
fields.description: The total quota of active Smart+ Campaigns for the ad account.

fields.name: used_quota
fields.description: The number of active Smart+ Campaigns within the ad account.

fields.name: used_campaign_ids
fields.description: Returned only when used_quota is greater than 0. The IDs of the active Smart+ Campaigns within the ad account. To disable active Smart+ Campaigns, use /campaign/status/update/ with operation_status set to DISABLE .
